value.title: Announcing Power BI Premium Per User general availability and autoscale preview for Gen2
value.excerpt: The Microsoft Power BI team’s mission is to help our customers drive a data culture where everyone can make better decisions with data. value.title: Announcing the new Power BI embedded analytics playground (preview)
value.excerpt: Today we’re excited to announce the new Power BI embedded analytics playground. The new playground is the home for Power BI embedded analytics, where you can get hands-on coding experience, embed your own reports, and interact with our client APIs to see instant results. value.title: Object-Level Security (OLS) now available for public preview in Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: We‘re excited to announce object level security (OLS) is now available for public preview in Power BI Premium and Pro!

value.title: Announcing General Availability (GA) of the Power BI connector for Databricks
value.excerpt: We are excited to announce General Availability (GA) of the Power BI connector for Databricks, including the ability to connect to Databricks without an on-premises data gateway as well as support for Azure Active Directory (AAD) authentication and SSO in DirectQuery mode in the Power BI service.

value.title: Power BI On-premises data gateway February update released
value.excerpt: The Power BI On-premises data gateway update for this month introduces a name change for the Azure Cosmos DB Connector, a .NET framework update, in addition to other changes as well.

value.title: Microsoft's Power BI gets new tools to prevent leakage of confidential data
value.excerpt: Information protection makes sure that only people with permissions see data in Power BI, while retaining the ability to share top-level trends, balancing productivity and security.

value.title: Best practice rules to improve your model᾿s performance
value.excerpt: Want to improve the performance and design of your Power BI model? Run these newly published rules against your model to quickly identify areas of improvement!

value.title: Paginated Reports January 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to our very first update of 2021!  We have several exciting updates rolling out this month for paginated reports,  including  an improved editing and publishing experience in Power BI Report Builder, additional sample reports, Microsoft Dataverse connectivity and much more!  Read on to learn

value.title: Power BI Report Server January 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: We are kicking off 2021 by sharing an updated version of Power BI Report Server! With this update, we’re bringing visual zoom sliders, custom publish message and ESRI ArcGIS support, amongst others. Read on to get the full details.

value.title: Step Folding Indicators for Power Query Online
value.excerpt: We’re pleased to share that we are now previewing step folding indicators in Power Query Online. These indicators will allow you to understand which steps fold, and which steps don’t. Read on for more.

value.title: Get up to speed with Power BI and Microsoft Cloud App Security
value.excerpt: Using Cloud App Security, it is possible to detect and control risky Power BI sessions as they occur, thus reducing the threat that arises when malicious actors try to access content and data.
